summary: Follows the history of two robots, the members of Daft Punk, on their quest to become human.
cast: Peter Hurteau|Michael Reich|Helena Stoddard|Vance Hartwell|Lilo Tauvao|Ken Banks|Howie Adams|Ritche Lago Bautista|Amir Bokhari|Alina Bolshakova|Jordan Bonson|Bradley Schneider|Joshua Calhaun|Bradley Davis|Alan Deane|Daniel Doble|William Egesdal|TaShanique Elzie|Christie Vaughn|Trisha Hershberger|Terrel Jean|Carrington Kilduff|Cameron King|Ted Kyander|Marilyn Shannon|Julio Munoz-Diaz|Thomas Rini|Nicole Spivey|Athena Stamos|Karl Edvard Groundstroem|Cassidy Michelle Mount|Christi M. Mount|Joshua Ryan Mount|François Choquet
director: Directors: Thomas Bangalter, Guy-Manuel De Homem-Christo
title: Electroma
